trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Topeka
There were no other sightings in Topeka on or around April 30th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was traveling on a greyhound bus from lancaster, pa to denver, co, somewhere in kansas near topeka, when i looked out the window and saw a circular disk with lights all around the edges. i am in contact with aliens who now claim they are from tau ceti, the "black triangle civilization" (as they like to be called for now), and they telepathed to me to look out the window. apparently, there is cooperation among several space alien civilizations right now to protect me from the president bush and the armed personnel of the united states. i have disseminated information which may have jeapordized the efforts to hide the truth about space aliens among said personnel. i beg mufon not to mention my name in association with any of my claims, as it would cause the space aliens to have to exert more power to protect me. over. jonathan keith sheriff, ba ps - for more information about me and the tau cetians, please read all of the entries on the mufon webboards under the name "smokeytbones". over.
